_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e3d1-f4dc-8000-9ba4-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task'(
  taskId: null,

  taskRefId: ri!templateTask.taskRef.taskRefId,

  docUploadContext: ri!templateTask.taskRef.docUploadContext,
  taskPrecedents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!templateTask.templateTaskPrecedents,
    expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task_Precedent'(
      taskPrecedentId: null,
      taskId: null,
      /* Here we are storing the index of the precedent within the larger list of tasks */
      /* This is because we do not have actual IDs before writing to the database */
      /* Within process AS TMG Process Setup, within rule AS_GSS_TMG_UT_setTaskPrecedentsOnTasksAfterInitialWrite, */
      /* we will update the IDs after writing the initial tasks without precedents */
      /* For Review document, we will be using groupId for getting the precedent indices*/
      taskId_precedent: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField(
        cdt: ri!template.templateTasks,
        field: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(fv!item.groupId_precedent),
          "groupAssignee",
          "taskRef.taskRefId"
        ),
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(fv!item.groupId_precedent),
          fv!item.groupId_precedent,
          fv!item.taskRefId_precedent
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  availableDatetime: null,
  dueDate: if(
    and(
      ri!calculateDueDate = true,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!templateTask.templateTaskPrecedents)
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_TMG_BL_getDueDateBasedOnDuration(templateTask: ri!templateTask),
    null
  ),
  duration: ri!templateTask.duration,
  durationUnit: ri!templateTask.durationUnit,
  noOfDaysFromStart: ri!templateTask.noOfDaysFromStart,
  completedBy: null,
  completedDatetime: null,
  vendor: null,
  criteria: null,
  createdBy: null,
  createdDatetime: null,
  modifiedBy: null,
  modifiedDatetime: null
)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATOR_TEAM,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters.value,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!teamId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "teamId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!teamId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive=true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel(
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,

      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/

        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_evaluationLandingPage
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!loggedInUser: loggedInUser(),
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
    startIndex: 1,
    batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_BATCH_SIZE_FOR_EVALUATIONS_IN_HOME_PAGE
  ),
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isEvaluator: rule!AS_GSS_BL_determineIfUserIsEvaluator(loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser),
  local!evaluations: rule!AS_GSS_BL_returnEvaluationInfoForLandingPage(
    loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
    executeWhen: true(),
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
  ),
  local!selectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: { local!triggerRefresh }
  ),
  local!canUserCreateEvalaution: rule!AS_GSS_BL_getVisibilityToCreateEvaluation(user: local!loggedInUser),
  local!isHomePage: true(),
  rule!AS_GSS_HCL_evaluationsLandingPage(
    header: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_landingPageHeader(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      showCreateEvaluationAction: and(
        local!canUserCreateEvalaution,
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: local!evaluations.data)
      )
    ),
    contents: {
      /*My Active Evaluations*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeEvaluations(
        evaluations: local!evaluations,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        showCreateEvaluationAction: local!canUserCreateEvalaution
      ),
      /*My Tasks*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeTasks(
        selectedTasks: local!selectedTasks,
        user: local!loggedInUser,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        isHomePage: local!isHomePage,
        showWhen: true(),
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
      )
    }
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_createRunTimeTaskForCompleteEvaluation
_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!taskRefData: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskRefs(
    taskRefId: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_TASK_REF_ID_COMPLETE_EVALUATION,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
        {
          rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!evaluationFactors,
            field: "isActive",
            value: true
          ),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
            field: "isActive",
            value: true
          )
        }
      ),
      expression: a!flatten(
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentFactor: a!flatten(fv!item),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
              cdt: ri!vendors,
              field: "isActive",
              value: true
            ),
            expression: a!localVariables(
              local!currentVendor: fv!item,
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                  cdt: local!currentFactor[1].assignments,
                  field: "isActive",
                  value: true
                ),
                expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata(
                  cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields(
                    cdt: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CDT_mapTaskRefToRuntimeTask(taskRef: local!taskRefData),
                    fields: {
                      "evaluation",
                      "vendor",
                      "criteria",
                      "taskName",
                      "taskDesc",
                      "userAssignee",
                      "groupAssignee",
                      "dueDate",
                      "availableDatetime",
                      "taskStatus.taskStatusId"
                    },
                    newValues: {
                      ri!evaluation,
                      local!currentVendor,
                      local!currentFactor,
                      ri!evaluation.evaluationNumber & " - " & local!currentFactor.factorNumber & " | " & local!currentVendor.legalName,
                      cons!AS_GSS_TXT_TASK_DESC_FOR_COMPLETE_EVALUATION,
                      rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                        cdt: a!flatten(fv!item),
                        field: "assignee.username"
                      ),
                      cons!AS_GSS_GRP_EVALUATORS,
                      local!currentFactor.dueDate,
                      now(),
                      cons!AS_GSS_TMG_REF_ID_TASK_STATUS_ASSIGNED
                    }
                  ),
                  modifiedBy: ri!initiator
                )
              )
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler

_a-0000e99c-12b8-8000-9c55-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_INP_dateField(
  label: "Due Date",
  labelPosition: if(ri!isSubFactor, "COLLAPSED", "ABOVE"),
  value: ri!currentEvaluationFactor.dueDate,
  validations: if(
    ri!currentEvaluationFactor.dueDate >= today(),
    rule!AS_GSS_VD_criteriaDueDateValidation(
      evalStartDate: ri!currentEvaluationFactor.evaluation.evaluationStartDate,
      evalDueDate: ri!currentEvaluationFactor.evaluation.evaluationDueDate,
      factorDueDate: ri!currentEvaluationFactor.dueDate,
      isSubFactor: ri!isSubFactor,
      parentFactorDueDate: if(
        ri!isSubFactor = true,
        ri!parentFactorDue,
        null
      )
    ),
    "Due Date cannot be in past"
  ),
  saveInto: if(
    ri!isSubFactor,
    ri!evaluationSubFactors[ri!index].dueDate,
    ri!evaluationFactors[ri!index].dueDate
  ),
  accessibilityText: if(
    ri!isSubFactor,
    null,
    ri!currentEvaluationFactor.criteriaName
  ),
  required: true
)

_a-0000e99c-12b8-8000-9c55-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!allTeamMembers: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!evaluatorTeams,
      expression: fv!item.teamMembership.member.username
    )
  ),
  local!members: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
      ri!currentEvaluationFactor.evaluatorTeam
    ),
    null,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
        cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
          cdt: ri!currentEvaluationFactor.evaluatorTeam,
          field: "teamMembership"
        ),
        field: "isActive",
        value: true
      ),
      field: "member"
    )
  ),
  local!choiceValues: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(local!members.username)
    ),
    null,
    touniformstring(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(local!members.username)
    )
  ),
  local!choiceLabels: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!choiceValues),
    null,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(local!members),
      expression: rule!AS_GAM_UT_concatUserFirstNameLastName(
        firstName: fv!item.firstName,
        lastName: fv!item.lastName
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField(
    label: "Evaluators",
    labelPosition: if(ri!isSubFactor, "COLLAPSED", "ABOVE"),
    choiceLabels: local!choiceLabels,
    choiceValues: local!choiceValues,
    placeholderLabel: "Select Evaluators",
    accessibilityText: if(
      ri!isSubFactor,
      null,
      ri!currentEvaluationFactor.criteriaName
    ),
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      touniformstring(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
          cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!currentEvaluationFactor.assignments,
            field: "isActive",
            value: true
          ),
          field: "assignee"
        ).username
      )
    ),
    saveInto: {
      a!save(
        ri!currentEvaluationFactor.assignments,
        rule!AS_GSS_BL_saveIntoForUpdateEvaluatorAssignments(
          criteria: ri!currentEvaluationFactor,
          selectedAssignees: save!value,
          userDetails: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!userDetails,
            field: "username",
            value: save!value
          ),
          allTeamMembers: local!allTeamMembers
        )
      ),
      a!save(
        if(
          ri!isSubFactor,
          ri!evaluationSubFactors[ri!index],
          ri!evaluationFactors[ri!index]
        ),
        ri!currentEvaluationFactor
      )
    },
    required: true,
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: ri!bundle,
      bundleKey: if(
        ri!isSubFactor,
        "txt_EvaluatorsFieldValidationForSubFactor",
        "txt_EvaluatorsFieldValidationForFactor"
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_separateListItemsInSentence
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!list: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(array: ri!list),
  if(
    count(local!list) <= 1,
    concat(local!list),
    if(
      count(local!list) = 2,
      concat(
        local!list[1],
        " ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[2]
      ),
      concat(
        joinarray(
          remove(local!list, count(local!list)),
          ", "
        ),
        ", ",
        ri!finalSeparator,
        " ",
        local!list[count(local!list)]
      )
    )
  )
)

  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_R_TEMPLATE,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    logicalExpressions: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
        ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
        operator: "AND",
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "templateId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!templateId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "templateName",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!templateName
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "templateType.refDataId",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!templateTypeId
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_createSearchLogicalExpression(
        searchTerm: ri!searchText,
        fields: {
          "templateName",
          "templateDesc",
          "modifiedBy"
        }
      )
    }
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_Template',
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_USER,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_User',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    logicalExpressions: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
        operator: "AND",
        ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!isActive,
            applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!isActive)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "username",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!usernames
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      ri!logicalExpression
    }
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "firstName", ascending: true)
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_TASK,
  excludeNestedCdts:ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
    logicalExpressions: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
        operator: "AND",
        ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorTypeCode",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!behaviorTypeCode
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskBehaviorType.behaviorSubtypeCode",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!behaviorSubtypeCode
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!evaluationId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskStatus.taskStatusId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskStatusIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskRefId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskRefIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskCategory.categoryName",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!categoryName
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "userAssignee",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!userAssignee
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      ri!additionalLogicalExpressions
    },
    
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  sort: ri!sort,

)
